content.summary: Highly motivated Software Engineer with 4 years of experience in cloud application development, primarily using Python and Azure services. Seeking to transition into a leadership role within the next 3-5 years, focusing on project management and technical mentorship.
career_goals: Short-term (6-12 months): Lead a small feature development team; Obtain Azure Developer Associate certification.
Medium-term (1-3 years): Transition to a Technical Lead or Junior Project Leader role; Gain experience managing project timelines and resources.
Long-term (3-5 years): Become a recognized Project Leader or Cloud Solutions Architect within the company.

performance_review_notes.summary: Alex consistently delivers high-quality code and demonstrates strong technical skills. Shows potential for leadership but needs more experience in planning and delegation. Recommended for leadership training and mentorship opportunities.
